üè∑Ô∏è"...bumbleberry is a variety of fruits from the berry family ‚Äî wild blueberries, raspberries, strawberries, and blackberries!...You might think that you‚Äôll be overwhelmed with the tartness and sweetness, but this concentrated flavouring is balanced and absolutely delicious.." - [Link: Bumbleberry SC](https://www.wonderflavours.com/collections/super-concentrated-flavours/products/bumbleberry-sc)

​

Suggested Dilution Ratio: 0.1-1%

\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_

Single Flavor Test:  0.75%

60/40 | 0 Nic | Single 316L SS Fused Clapton | asMODus C4 RDA | Organic Japanese Cotton
